title: Anyone having problems patching
body:
When i try to patch it just says an unspecified error occurred check the logs for additional details. 
I dont even know what logs they are talking about. Anyone have any tips or solution. Ive tried restarting client several times.

replies.body: The issue can be caused by different factors depending on when you get it.  At what percent are you seeing this, and are you on the legacy or updated client?  Let me know!
Sorry I am dumb. It was just a hard drive space issue. Feel free to delete thread
Sorry I am dumb. It was just a hard drive space issue
if you use win10 install this new update it fixed it for me
